headline: Palo Alto Networks Expands Identity Security With CyberArk Deal And TASE Listing
summary: Palo Alto Networks (NasdaqGS:PANW) has completed its US$25b acquisition of CyberArk Software. The deal expands PANW into identity security and privileged access management. The company is also pursuing a dual listing on the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange, where it is set to become the most valuable company on the TASE. Together with the recent Chronosphere acquisition, the move signals a push to build a broader, integrated cybersecurity platform. Palo Alto Networks, known for its firewall, cloud...
